name: City of Aurora Open Data Catalog
description: Our Open Data Catalog has over 100 datasets for the public to access and utilize. Open data is especially relevant for land development, academic research, and city planning.
data_themes: INSPIRE themes (if mapping to EU vocabulary): Not clearly specified, but data appears to cover several themes including government, environment, planning, public safety, and utilities.
DCAT-AP mapping: Government and public sector, Environment, Planning (multiple themes covered)

geotopics.description: Address points, public art, facilities, schools, police/fire stations
